executable.title: Pose Labelmap
executable.description: Transform a labelmap according to the input armature transforms and weights. The armature should be of type *.vtk, and the transforms should be encoded as cell data with the name "Transforms". The armature weights should be represented as a files series of type *.mha. For each labelmap vertex, the algorithm tri-linearly interpolates the input weight vector field; the resulting weight vector is used to blend the input armature transforms using Dual Quarternion blending.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is supported by Air Force Research Laboratory (AFRL)

geometry.name: ArmaturePoly
geometry.label: Armature

directory.name: WeightDirectory
directory.label: Directories containing all the weights

boolean.name: LinearBlend
boolean.label: Use linear blend to pose
boolean.description: If set to true, the transform matrices will be combined linearly, which will result in non-rigid transforms.

integer.name: MaximumPass
integer.label: Maximum number of passes
integer.description: This property controls how many times the image is browse to fill the holes.

boolean.name: Debug
boolean.label: Debug Mode
boolean.description: Print debug logs and dump intermediate images.

boolean.name: IsArmatureInRAS
boolean.label: Armature in RAS
boolean.description: Whether input armature is already in the RAS(Right, Anterior, Superior) coordinate system (true) or in LPS (Left, Posterior, Superior) coordinate system (false, default). If not, it will be internally transformed into RAS.
